scripts.generate:client:ts: rm -rf src/lib/generated-sources/fetch-client; openapi-generator-cli generate -i src/ladon.yml -g typescript-fetch -o src/lib/generated-sources/fetch-client --additional-properties=supportsES6=true
scripts.generate:client:ng: rm -rf src/lib/generated-sources/angular-client; openapi-generator-cli generate -i  src/ladon.yml -g typescript-angular -o src/lib/generated-sources/angular-client
scripts.build-all: npm run generate:client:ts & npm run generate:client:ng
